item.title: The Fiercest Fighting of the Ukraine War May Be in Russia
item.description: The Times interviewed Russian soldiers who said they face a brutal fight to dislodge determined Ukrainian forces from a sliver of Russian land. Trappe...

item.title: In Trump’s Cross Hairs Over Taking Gazans, Egypt and Jordan Try Diversion
item.description: The U.S. president has repeatedly asked the two Mideast allies to take in two million Palestinians from Gaza. Both Egypt and Jordan have been trying t...

item.title: Kremlin Says U.S. Will Release a Russian in American Custody
item.description: Moscow said a Russian imprisoned in the U.S. would be freed “in the coming days” after the release of an American schoolteacher.

item.title: More Power for Elon Musk, and the Risk of Lithium-Ion Batteries
item.description: Plus, who isn’t in the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame.

item.title: Chubby Checker, Phish and Outkast Among Rock & Roll Hall of Fame Nominees
item.description: Billy Idol, the Black Crowes and Maná will also appear on the ballot for the first time, alongside Oasis, Joe Cocker, Mariah Carey and others.
